page.title: 12Adult Training Centre
page.content: Stanley.We have a computer.There are 4 teachers and a head teacher and a caretaker.We have been to Whitley Bay and have had the Theatre Company and we have been to Beamish for 3 days. {Lanchester Adult Training Centre. } The centre was opened in 1962.It consists of two main buildings-the centre and a hostel for 30 trainees.At present there are 76 trainees-12 women and 64 men.There are 7 staff-a manager ,a deputy manager and 5 instructors. Most trainers travel daily from as far as Waskerly in the north and Durham in the south-a radius of about 20,miles.
